name: Dune Buggy Adventure & Canopy Combo
description: Life is short so use your time wisely when you’re on vacation. We want you to enjoy the best of Vallarta, which is why we offer the brand new COMBO Tour! You can enjoy both adventures by conveniently taking the Dune Buggy Adventure to the El Eden Canopy Tour. On our Dune Buggy Adventure & Canopy Combo tour, you’ll get it all; tequila samples, off-road dune buggy fun, breathtaking scenic views, and even the exhilarating freedom of riding steel cable zip lines over the jungle. Now that’s a day you’ll never forget!
